div.p: Conidia germination inhibition of Curvularia lunata under crescent dosages of C. citratus ( Cymbopogon citratus) essential oil. Treatments: 0 (0.0 µL mL −1), 2 (Negative control, with methyl-thiophanate 2 mg mL −1). Concentrations of C. citratus essential oil = 0.625 µL mL −1; 1.25 µL mL −1; 2.5 µL mL −1; 5 µL mL −1 and 7.5 µL mL −1).
